sentences.sContent: This means that teams with KERS have less ballast to move around the car and hence have less freedom to vary their car’s weight distribution.
sentences.sContent_eng: This means that teams with KERS have less ballast to move around the car and hence have less freedom to vary their car’s weight distribution.
sentences.sCn: 这就是说使用KERS的车队使用了更少的压舱物来移动赛车，因此有较少的自由来改变他们的车的重量分配。

sentences.sContent: But small satellites, including shoebox-sized “cubesats”, are often used in place of the ballast carried by rockets to improve their weight distribution.
sentences.sContent_eng: But small satellites, including shoebox-sized “cubesats”, are often used in place of the ballast carried by rockets to improve their weight distribution.
sentences.sCn: 不过小型卫星（包括鞋盒大小的“立方体卫星”），常用来代替火箭携带的压舱物，以改善其重量分布。

synos.tran: [建][水运]压舱物，[船]压载物；道渣，碎石

phrases.pCn: 电子镇流器；电子安定器
压载水；压舱水；压舱配重水
压载舱；潜水艇沉浮箱；压载箱；压舱柜
道床；道碴床；碎石道床；道碴路基

trans.tranOther: heavy material that is carried by a ship to make it more steady in the water
